feed.title: Password Pusher Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.39.2: Dashboard, DB & Dependency Updates
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Config: Make default db db/db.sqlite3 (#1995) @pglombardo

:rocket: Features

  • Admin Dashboard: Show Creation Date & Sign In Count to Users Display (#1989) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump rdoc from 6.6.2 to 6.6.3.1 (#1994) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump nio4r from 2.7.0 to 2.7.1 (#1993) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rack from 3.0.9.1 to 3.0.10 (#1992) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump better_html from 2.1.0 to 2.1.1 (#1990) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.145.0 to 1.146.0 (#1988) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump locale from 2.1.3 to 2.1.4 (#1987) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-kms from 1.77.0 to 1.78.0 (#1985) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump nokogiri from 1.16.2 to 1.16.3 (#1983) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.144.0 to 1.145.0 (#1982) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump sqlite3 from 1.7.2 to 1.7.3 (#1980) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump google-apis-storage_v1 from 0.35.0 to 0.36.0 (#1978) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.191.3 to 3.191.4 (#1977) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.39.2

..and go to http://localhost:5100

:link: Useful Links

  • Configuration Documentation
  • API Documentation
  • Docker Hub
  • GitHub
  • Website
  • Twitter
  • Newsletter

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: Release Tag updated to 1.37.7
New release for Password Pusher: v1.39.3: nil Safety & Dependency Updates
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Add nil safety (#2006) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump config from 5.3.0 to 5.4.0 (#1979) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.901.0 to 1.902.0 (#2005) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.191.4 to 3.191.5 (#2004) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.900.0 to 1.901.0 (#2003) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump net-smtp from 0.4.0.1 to 0.5.0 (#2002) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump reline from 0.4.3 to 0.5.0 (#2000) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.899.0 to 1.900.0 (#1999) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump google-apis-storage_v1 from 0.36.0 to 0.37.0 (#1998) @dependabot

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.39.5: Centralise Things & Dependency Updates
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

:rocket: Features

  • ActionController::UnknownFormat: Centralize Handler (#2024) @pglombardo
  • Localization: Centralize Keys (#2019) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.906.0 to 1.907.0 (#2025) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump terser from 1.2.1 to 1.2.2 (#2023) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump public_suffix from 5.0.4 to 5.0.5 (#2021) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.191.5 to 3.191.6 (#2020) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.904.0 to 1.905.0 (#2017) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rake from 13.1.0 to 13.2.0 (#2016) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.903.0 to 1.904.0 (#2015) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump debug from 1.9.1 to 1.9.2 (#2014) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.902.0 to 1.903.0 (#2012) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump terser from 1.2.0 to 1.2.1 (#2011) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.146.0 to 1.146.1 (#2010) @dependabot
